Type.Name: SqlBinary

TypeSignature.Value: public struct SqlBinary : IComparable, System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable, System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

summary.para: Represents a variable-length stream of binary data to be stored in or retrieved from a database.
Initializes a new instance of the structure, setting the property to the contents of the supplied byte array.

Docs.param: The byte array to be stored or retrieved.
